title: MaxUnpool1d error
body_html:
I found some error in nn.MaxUnpool1d module.

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

pool = nn.MaxPool1d(kernel_size=3, stride=2, return_indices=True)
unpool = nn.MaxUnpool1d(kernel_size=3, stride=2)
input = Variable(torch.rand(32,128,263))
output, inx = pool(input)
input_ = unpool(output,inx)

However, if I use 2d instead, there is no error as blow.

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

pool = nn.MaxPool2d(kernel_size=(1,3), stride=(1,2), return_indices=True)
unpool = nn.MaxUnpool2d(kernel_size=(1,3), stride=(1,2))
input = Variable(torch.rand(32,128,1,263))
output, inx = pool(input)
input_ = unpool(output,inx)

from torch.autograd import Variable

body:
I found some error in nn.MaxUnpool1d module.

    import torch
    import torch.nn as nn
    from torch.autograd import Variable

    pool = nn.MaxPool1d(kernel_size=3, stride=2, return_indices=True)
    unpool = nn.MaxUnpool1d(kernel_size=3, stride=2)
    input = Variable(torch.rand(32,128,263))
    output, inx = pool(input)
    input_ = unpool(output,inx)

However, if I use 2d instead, there is no error as blow.

    import torch
    import torch.nn as nn
    from torch.autograd import Variable

    pool = nn.MaxPool2d(kernel_size=(1,3), stride=(1,2), return_indices=True)
    unpool = nn.MaxUnpool2d(kernel_size=(1,3), stride=(1,2))
    input = Variable(torch.rand(32,128,1,263))
    output, inx = pool(input)
    input_ = unpool(output,inx)
